databaseap.ap-sql: SELECT curdate()
SELECT appointment_date from appointment WHERE appointment_no=${appt_no}
SELECT provider.first_name, provider.last_name FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${provider}'
SELECT provider.ohip_no FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${provider}'

SELECT MID( comments, INSTR(comments,'<xml_p_specialty_code>')+22, INSTR(comments,'</xml_p_specialty_code>')-INSTR(comments,'<xml_p_specialty_code>')-22 ) AS specialty_code FROM provider WHERE provider_no='${provider}'
SELECT provider.practitionerNo FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${provider}'
SELECT '${provider}' AS providerId
SELECT * FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}

SELECT CONCAT(UPPER(SUBSTRING(first_name, 1, 1)), LOWER(SUBSTRING(first_name FROM 2))) AS first_name, CONCAT(UPPER(SUBSTRING(last_name, 1, 1)), LOWER(SUBSTRING(last_name FROM 2))) AS last_name FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT last_name FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
databaseap.ap-insql: UPDATE demographic SET last_name='${value}' WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}

databaseap.ap-sql: SELECT first_name FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
databaseap.ap-insql: UPDATE demographic SET first_name='${value}' WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}

databaseap.ap-sql: SELECT '${demographic}' AS demographicId
SELECT * FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT * FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT address, city, province, postal FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT address, city, province, postal FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT province FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT city FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT postal FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT date_of_birth, month_of_birth, year_of_birth FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT date_of_birth, month_of_birth, year_of_birth FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT date_of_birth, month_of_birth, year_of_birth FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT year_of_birth FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT month_of_birth FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT date_of_birth FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT * FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT hin, ver FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT hin FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT ver FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT hc_renew_date FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT chart_no FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT email FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic)
SELECT phone FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT phone2 FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT value FROM demographicExt WHERE demographic_no=${demographic} and key_val ='demo_cell';
SELECT value FROM demographicExt WHERE demographic_no=${demographic} and key_val ='hPhoneExt';
SELECT value FROM demographicExt WHERE demographic_no=${demographic} and key_val ='wPhoneExt';

SELECT (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)-YEAR(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((demographic.year_of_birth), '-', (demographic.month_of_birth), '-', (demographic.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d')))-(RIGHT(CURRENT_DATE, 5) < RIGHT(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((demographic.year_of_birth), '-', (demographic.month_of_birth), '-', (demographic.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d'),5)) AS 'age' FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}

SELECT (IF ( (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(@bdate))< 3, (IF ( (((YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - 1) * 12 + MONTH(CURRENT_DATE)) - ((YEAR(@bdate) - 1) * 12 + MONTH(@bdate))) - (MID(@bdate, 9, 2) < MID(@bdate, 9, 2))< 3, (IF ( FLOOR((TO_DAYS(CURRENT_DATE) - TO_DAYS(@bdate))/7)< 5, (IF ( (TO_DAYS(CURRENT_DATE) - TO_DAYS(@bdate))< 2, 'newborn', CONCAT((TO_DAYS(CURRENT_DATE) - TO_DAYS(@bdate)),' day old'))), CONCAT(FLOOR((TO_DAYS(CURRENT_DATE) - TO_DAYS(@bdate))/7),' week old'))), CONCAT((((YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - 1) * 12 + MONTH(CURRENT_DATE)) - ((YEAR(@bdate) - 1) * 12 + MONTH(@bdate))) - (MID(@bdate, 9, 2) < MID(@bdate, 9, 2)),' month old'))), CONCAT((YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(@bdate)) - (MID(CURRENT_DATE, 6, 5) < MID(CURRENT_DATE, 6, 5)),' year old'))) as ageComplex from (SELECT @bdate:= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((demographic.year_of_birth), '-', (demographic.month_of_birth), '-', (demographic.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') AS birthdate FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}) as t
SELECT sex FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.socialHistory SEPARATOR ', ') as socialHistories FROM( SELECT notes.note as socialHistory FROM (SELECT cn.position, iss.id, iss.demographic_no as demo, iss.issue_id, cin.note_id, cn.note FROM casemgmt_issue iss, casemgmt_issue_notes cin, casemgmt_note cn, issue i WHERE iss.id = cin.id AND iss.issue_id=i.issue_id AND i.code='SocHistory' AND cin.note_id = cn.note_id AND iss.demographic_no =${demographic} ORDER BY cn.note_id DESC) as notes GROUP BY notes.position) AS t

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.omed SEPARATOR ', ') as omeds FROM( SELECT notes.note as omed FROM (SELECT cn.position, iss.id, iss.demographic_no as demo, iss.issue_id, cin.note_id, cn.note FROM casemgmt_issue iss, casemgmt_issue_notes cin, casemgmt_note cn, issue i WHERE iss.id = cin.id AND iss.issue_id=i.issue_id AND i.code='OMeds' AND cin.note_id = cn.note_id AND iss.demographic_no =${demographic} ORDER BY cn.note_id DESC) as notes GROUP BY notes.position) AS t

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.medicalHistory SEPARATOR ', ') as medicalHistories FROM( SELECT notes.note as medicalHistory FROM (SELECT cn.position, iss.id, iss.demographic_no as demo, iss.issue_id, cin.note_id, cn.note FROM casemgmt_issue iss, casemgmt_issue_notes cin, casemgmt_note cn, issue i WHERE iss.id = cin.id AND iss.issue_id=i.issue_id AND i.code='MedHistory' AND cin.note_id = cn.note_id AND iss.demographic_no =${demographic} ORDER BY cn.note_id DESC) as notes GROUP BY notes.position) AS t

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(icd9.description SEPARATOR ', ') AS dxlist FROM icd9, dxresearch WHERE status='A' AND coding_system='icd9' AND icd9.icd9=dxresearch.dxresearch_code AND demographic_no=${demographic};

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT billing_on_item.dx) AS ohipdxc FROM billing_on_item, billing_on_cheader1 WHERE billing_on_cheader1.id=billing_on_item.ch1_id AND billing_on_cheader1.demographic_no=${demographic};
SELECT ongoingConcerns FROM eChart WHERE demographicNo=${demographic} ORDER BY eChartId DESC limit 1
SELECT reminders FROM eChart WHERE demographicNo=${demographic} ORDER BY eChartId DESC limit 1

SELECT IF ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM allergies, demographic WHERE ( demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND allergies.demographic_no=demographic.demographic_no AND allergies.archived=1))>0, CONCAT((SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(allergies.DESCRIPTION SEPARATOR ', ') FROM allergies, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND allergies.demographic_no=demographic.demographic_no AND allergies.archived != 1),' \n','archived allergies:',(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(allergies.DESCRIPTION SEPARATOR ', ') FROM allergies, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND allergies.demographic_no=demographic.demographic_no AND allergies.archived = 1)), (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(allergies.DESCRIPTION SEPARATOR ', ') FROM allergies, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND allergies.demographic_no=demographic.demographic_no AND allergies.archived != 1)) as allergy

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(allergies.DESCRIPTION SEPARATOR ', ')as allergy FROM allergies, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND allergies.demographic_no=demographic.demographic_no AND allergies.archived != 1

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(p.date_prescribed,' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(p.textView, '

', -1)),'
' ORDER BY p.date_prescribed DESC SEPARATOR '') AS rx FROM prescription p WHERE p.demographic_no=${demographic} and p.date_prescribed=LEFT(now(),10)

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT if(LENGTH(d.GN) > 4, GN, d.customName) , if(d.takemax > d.takemin, CONCAT(' ',d.takemin,'-',d.takemax,' '), CONCAT(' ',d.takemin,' ')) , d.freqcode , if(d.prn=1,' prn','') ORDER BY d.rx_date DESC SEPARATOR '\n' ) AS rxgen FROM drugs d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND d.end_date > DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND d.archived='0';

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT if(LENGTH(d.GN) > 4, BN, d.customName) , if(d.takemax > d.takemin, CONCAT(' ',d.takemin,'-',d.takemax,' '), CONCAT(' ',d.takemin,' ')) , d.freqcode , if(d.prn=1,' prn','') ORDER BY d.rx_date DESC SEPARATOR '\n' ) AS rxlist FROM drugs d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND d.end_date > DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND d.archived='0';

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT if(LENGTH(d.GN) > 4, CONCAT(UCASE(SUBSTRING(d.BN, 1, 1)),LOWER(SUBSTRING(d.BN, 2))), d.customName) , IF(d.takemax > d.takemin, CONCAT(' ',d.takemin,'-',d.takemax,' '), CONCAT(' ',d.takemin,' ')) , d.freqcode , IF(d.prn=1,' prn','') ORDER BY d.rx_date DESC SEPARATOR ', ' ) AS rxlist FROM drugs d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND d.end_date > DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND d.archived='0';
SELECT provider.first_name, provider.last_name FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider.ohip_no FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no

SELECT MID( p.comments, INSTR(p.comments,'<xml_p_specialty_code>')+22, INSTR(p.comments,'</xml_p_specialty_code>')-INSTR(p.comments,'<xml_p_specialty_code>')-22 ) AS specialty_code FROM provider p, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND d.provider_no=p.provider_no
SELECT provider.practitionerNo FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider.last_name, provider.first_name FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
select substring(provider.first_name,1,1) as first_init,provider.last_name FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider.work_phone FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT p.last_name, p.first_name FROM provider p, appointment a WHERE p.provider_no=a.provider_no AND a.appointment_no=${appt_no}
SELECT provider_no FROM appointment WHERE appointment_no=${appt_no}
SELECT ${appt_no} as appt_no

SELECT professionalSpecialists.lName, professionalSpecialists.fName FROM professionalSpecialists, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(professionalSpecialists.referralNo) > 0 AND SUBSTRING(demographic.family_doctor,9,(LENGTH(professionalSpecialists.referralNo)))=professionalSpecialists.referralNo

SELECT professionalSpecialists.address AS raddress FROM professionalSpecialists, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(professionalSpecialists.referralNo) > 0 AND SUBSTRING(demographic.family_doctor,9,(LENGTH(professionalSpecialists.referralNo)))=professionalSpecialists.referralNo

SELECT professionalSpecialists.phone FROM professionalSpecialists, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(professionalSpecialists.referralNo) > 0 AND SUBSTRING(demographic.family_doctor,9,(LENGTH(professionalSpecialists.referralNo)))=professionalSpecialists.referralNo

SELECT professionalSpecialists.fax FROM professionalSpecialists, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(professionalSpecialists.referralNo) > 0 AND SUBSTRING(demographic.family_doctor,9,(LENGTH(professionalSpecialists.referralNo)))=professionalSpecialists.referralNo

SELECT billingreferral.last_name, billingreferral.first_name FROM billingreferral, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(billingreferral.referral_no) > 0 AND SUBSTRING(demographic.family_doctor,9,(LENGTH(billingreferral.referral_no)))=billingreferral.referral_no

SELECT CONCAT( b.address1, IF( b.address1 ='', '', '\n' ), b.address2, IF( b.address2 ='', '', '\n' ) , b.city, ' ', b.province, ' ', b.postal ) AS raddress FROM billingreferral b, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(b.referral_no) > 0 AND SUBSTRING(d.family_doctor,9,(LENGTH(b.referral_no)))=b.referral_no
SELECT b.phone FROM billingreferral b, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(b.referral_no) > 0 AND SUBSTRING(d.family_doctor,9,(LENGTH(b.referral_no)))=b.referral_no
SELECT b.fax FROM billingreferral b, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(b.referral_no) > 0 AND SUBSTRING(d.family_doctor,9,(LENGTH(b.referral_no)))=b.referral_no
SELECT b.referral_no FROM billingreferral b, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(b.referral_no) > 0 AND SUBSTRING(d.family_doctor,9,(LENGTH(b.referral_no)))=b.referral_no
SELECT clinic_name FROM clinic
SELECT clinic_phone FROM clinic
SELECT clinic_fax FROM clinic
SELECT * FROM clinic
SELECT clinic_address FROM clinic
SELECT * FROM clinic
SELECT * FROM clinic
SELECT * FROM clinic
SELECT * FROM clinic
SELECT * FROM clinic

SELECT count(0) FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND var_value='${var_value}' AND demographic_no like '${eform_demographic}' AND fid=${fid} AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_data WHERE status=1)

SELECT count(0) FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND NOT (var_value='' OR var_value IS NULL) AND demographic_no like '${eform_demographic}' AND fid=${fid} AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_data WHERE status=1)

SELECT count(0) FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND var_value='${var_value}' AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_data WHERE status=1 AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${ref_var_name}' AND var_value='${ref_var_value}' AND fid=${fid}))

SELECT count(0) FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND NOT (var_value='' OR var_value IS NULL) AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_data WHERE status=1 AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${ref_var_name}' AND var_value='${ref_var_value}' AND fid=${fid}))

SELECT count(0) FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND var_value='${var_value}' AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_data WHERE status=1 AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_values WHERE fid=${fid} AND var_name='${ref_var_name}' AND NOT (var_value='' OR var_value IS NULL)))

SELECT count(0) FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND NOT (var_value='' OR var_value IS NULL) AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_data WHERE status=1 AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_values WHERE fid=${fid} AND var_name='${ref_var_name}' AND NOT (var_value='' OR var_value IS NULL)))
SELECT other_id FROM other_id WHERE table_name=${table_name} AND table_id=${table_id} AND other_key='${other_key}' AND deleted=false ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
select prevention_date from preventions p where p.prevention_type = 'dtap-ipv-hib' and p.deleted = '0' and p.demographic_no = ${demographic} order by p.prevention_date desc limit 1
select prevention_date from preventions p where p.prevention_type = 'Flu' and p.deleted = '0' and p.demographic_no = ${demographic} order by p.prevention_date desc limit 1
select prevention_date from preventions p where p.prevention_type = 'FOBT' and p.deleted = '0' and p.demographic_no = ${demographic} order by p.prevention_date desc limit 1
select prevention_date from preventions p where p.prevention_type = 'MAM' and p.deleted = '0' and p.demographic_no = ${demographic} order by p.prevention_date desc limit 1
select prevention_date from preventions p where p.prevention_type = 'PAP' and p.deleted = '0' and p.demographic_no = ${demographic} order by p.prevention_date desc limit 1
select d.first_name, d.last_name, d.address, d.city, d.province, d.postal from relationships r, demographic d where r.relation_demographic_no = d.demographic_no and r.demographic_no = ${demographic}

select d.first_name, d.last_name, d.address, d.city, d.province, d.postal from DemographicContact r, demographic d where r.contactId = d.demographic_no and r.sdm = 'true' and r.demographicNo = ${demographic}
